name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software development, specializing in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Google Cloud**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **CI/CD** methodologies. Proficient in cloud-native application deployment and infrastructure management utilizing **Terraform**, **GitHub Actions**, and implementing **DevSecOps** practices. Experienced in designing and developing scalable microservices and event-driven APIs, as well as integrating compliance-driven development aligned with PCI DSS and SOC 2 standards.

Skilled in programming languages including **Java** and **Python**, with a strong technical foundation in **NoSQL** databases and real-time data processing using **Kafka** and **Spark**. Well-versed in MLOps frameworks, employing tools such as MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow for model orchestration, training, and serving. Committed to Agile methodologies, utilizing **Jira** and **Confluence** for project management and collaboration. A proven track record of delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors, adept at leveraging **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **Java** and **Python** to design and develop full-stack platforms within healthcare and fintech sectors, ensuring compliance with critical regulations including HIPAA and GDPR.
Engineered **microservices** architectures utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes (v1.20)** to facilitate scalable and fault-tolerant application deployments.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Terraform**, enhancing development workflows with automated testing and deployment processes.
Designed secure **REST** and **Event-driven APIs** for both iOS and Android mobile applications, utilizing **Flutter** and **React Native** to deliver engaging user experiences.
Developed data solutions with **NoSQL** (MongoDB) and traditional databases (PostgreSQL), optimizing real-time data access and analytics capabilities across systems.
Orchestrated **MLOps** workflows using **Azure** and **Google Cloud**, enabling robust model management and deployment processes for data-driven applications.
Integrated machine learning models for advanced analytics and risk assessment using frameworks like **TensorFlow** and **scikit-learn**, with applications deployed in production environments.
Established and enforced robust security practices as part of **DevSecOps** initiatives, including automated security checks in CI/CD pipelines to safeguard cloud deployments.
Teamed with cross-functional partners in an **Agile** environment, leveraging tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** for effective project management and transparency.
Executed advanced data visualization techniques using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing stakeholders to analyze 9+ critical financial and operational KPIs in real-time.
Simultaneously managed several projects with measurable impact, consistently improving deployment efficiency by **20%** and reducing legacy system overhead by **30%**.

• Developed and maintained **microservices** architecture using **Python** (FastAPI/Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to significantly enhance system scalability and performance, managing over **1M** transactions daily.
• Utilized **React** (18), **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to build responsive front-end applications that improved user engagement by **30%**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for seamless UI development.
• Created real-time analytics dashboards with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with insights for over **500K** transactions and detecting anomalies effectively.
• Orchestrated an event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to facilitate asynchronous communication in workflows, achieving a **25%** reduction in processing time for critical operations like payments.
• Designed ETL pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting financial data from diverse sources, capable of processing batch jobs in **under 10 minutes**.
• Implemented machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, enabling proactive detection and reducing fraudulent transactions by **15%**.
• Engineered ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, allowing for real-time model inference integrated into backend services, enhancing service response times by **20%**.
• Actively participated in Agile methodologies with tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** to ensure timely project deliveries and improved team collaboration.

Utilized **Python** and **Java** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **Kafka**, event-driven APIs, and WebSockets, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
Developed backend services with microservices architecture, leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **AWS** for scalable deployment solutions.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Terraform**, improving deployment speed by **30%** and enhancing system reliability.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and other NoSQL databases for distributed data storage, ensuring high-performance capabilities for busy e-commerce workflows.
Applied **MLOps** strategies to integrate AI-driven recommendation engines, optimizing product listings based on user behaviors and improving conversion rates by **15%**.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **React** and **Vue 3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance.
Designed and deployed a fully automated infrastructure using **Infrastructure-as-code** principles for rapid scaling and efficient resource management.
Established role-based access control (RBAC) using **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring compliance with **GDPR** regulations and safeguarding user data.
Implemented DevSecOps principles to enhance security across deployment pipelines, reducing potential vulnerabilities by **40%**.
